hero.title: Your Business. Your Website. Live in 5 Minutes.
hero.subtitle: Trusted by 50,000+ businesses worldwide. Create stunning, conversion-optimized stores for any industry with our enterprise-grade no-code platform.

exploreStores.title: Industry-Specific Solutions
exploreStores.subtitle: Explore our specialized templates and features designed for your industry. Each solution comes with industry-specific tools and integrations.

categories.title: Hotels
categories.description: Boutique hotels, resorts, and bed & breakfasts showcase their rooms and services with stunning booking systems.

categories.title: Ecommerce
categories.description: Fashion brands, electronics stores, and artisan shops sell products with beautiful catalogs and secure checkout.

categories.title: Weddings
categories.description: Wedding planners, photographers, and venues share their portfolios and book clients with elegant galleries.

categories.title: Automobiles
categories.description: Car dealerships, rental companies, and mechanics display inventory and connect with customers online.

categories.title: Business Websites
categories.description: Professional websites for salons, gyms, restaurants, consultants, and more. Showcase services with elegant templates.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Leading Brands Choose StoreBuilder
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Join thousands of successful businesses who trust our platform to power their online growth.

benefits.title: No-Code Platform
benefits.description: Build professional stores without writing a single line of code. Our drag-and-drop interface makes it simple.

benefits.title: Unlimited Customization
benefits.description: Design freedom with hundreds of templates and complete brand control. Make your store uniquely yours.

benefits.title: Enterprise-Grade Infrastructure
benefits.description: Built on reliable cloud infrastructure with 99.9% uptime and lightning-fast loading speeds.

benefits.title: Secure & Compliant
benefits.description: Bank-level security with SSL certificates, PCI compliance, and automated backups included.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Industry Leaders
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our customers say about their success with StoreBuilder.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.text: StoreBuilder transformed our booking process. We went from 20% to 85% online bookings in just 3 months.

items.name: Mike Chen
items.text: The platform paid for itself in the first month. Sales increased by 300% with their conversion-optimized templates.

items.name: Emily Rodriguez
items.text: My clients love the professional portfolio gallery. I've booked more weddings this year than ever before.

features.title: No Code Required

faqs.question: What's included in the free trial?
faqs.answer: You get full access to all features for 14 days, including custom domains, premium templates, and priority support. No credit card required to start.

faqs.question: Can I change plans later?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. When you upgrade, you'll only pay the prorated difference for the current billing cycle.

faqs.question: Do you offer refunds?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, we'll refund your payment in full.

faqs.question: Is there a setup fee?
faqs.answer: No setup fees! The price you see is exactly what you pay. We believe in transparent pricing with no hidden costs.

faqs.question: Can I use my own domain?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Professional and Enterprise plans include a free custom domain for the first year. You can also connect an existing domain you own.

faqs.question: How secure is my website?
faqs.answer: Very secure! All plans include SSL certificates, regular backups, malware protection, and we follow industry best practices for security.
